medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has had pain for 5 months, worsening over the last 4 days. The pain is intermittent and worsens with eating. The current episode started last night, improved somewhat in the morning, then worsened in intensity. Patient reports nausea and vomiting two times.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism, hypertension, parasitic infection, previous exploratory laparotomy.
